items.description: The original 'Cobra' manga by Buichi Terasawa is a classic, but Osamu Dezaki’s movie adaptation is legendary, and this ultra-HD Blu-ray doesn’t disapp...

items.title: Surprise Google Chrome 131 Update For Windows, Mac, Linux, Android
items.description: Google has got 2025 off to a surprise start with an emergency security update for all Chrome browser users—update now.

items.title: How To Make Sure AI Regulation Gets Up To Speed
items.description: Regulating AI is an urgent matter, but doing so ineffectively will undermine progress, stifle innovation and sow distrust instead of quelling it.

items.title: How Fashion Brands Can Tap Into The Rise Of Independent Retail
items.description: In recent years, independent retailers have played an increasingly large role in the expansion of the fashion industry.

items.title: The Truth About The ‘New Year Comet’ ATLAS G3
items.description: Comet ATLAS G3 will be closest to the Sun on Jan. 13, 2025, but will mainly be visible only from the Southern Hemisphere.
